desc: This thing will pack a serious punch. Nobody will want to mess with you. Minimum Damage: 5. Maximum Damage: 20.
headDesc: [You shoot the captive in the head....brains everywhere. Really?]
chestDesc: [You put a bullet hole right through the chest. It will be pretty amazing if the captive doesn't bleed out, idiot...]
stomachDesc: [You shoot the captive in the stomach, hoping not to hit any vital organs.]
genitalsDesc: Captive: AHHHHHH FUUUUCK!!!! [This captive will not be having kids.]
armsDesc: Captive: FUCK! SHIT! [You shoot an arm and it goes numb.]
legsDesc: Captive: motherFUCKER!! [You blow out a kneecap.]
